Class DistanceTileProbability

  • Object
    • DistanceTileProbability
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TileProbability

    public class DistanceTileProbability
extends Object
implements TileProbability
    Author:
    JeT this function return 1 when the pixel distance is between min and max value. 0 elsewhere

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getWeight(double x, double y)
      return a probability of apparition. probability should be between 0 & 1 but may be composed with other probability. 1 is not exactly the probabilistic "sure" value
